creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: three men on shore at L strain to pull a large boat full of rolled wooden bundles to shore; two men on boat at R: man in front steers with long stick while man behind shipment looks up, mouth open, toward two cranes flying over scene at upper center; blue mountain in background
title: Five Figures Pulling a Boat
